Reviews.Content: hotel special hotel clean front desk staff nice paid extra superior double complete waste money bed didnt bigger normal double advertised larger definitely wasnt bigger advertised larger looked fire escape map prepared stairs stay extrememly elevator luggage stairs youve touring paris day climb 3 flights stairs ours especially wasnt luggage closed standing time move floor luggage racks floor space bedding appeared clean bed comfortable pillows bathroom extremely dated kept clean flusher toilet cracked usually couple tries toilet flush shower leaked shower extremely tight barely fit im average height slim build husband duck head shower hes 6ft water pressure horrible hair 30 minutes soap water connected peoples heard flush door sudden burning hot water else showering couldnt hot water beautiful french window complete waste completely blocked giant tree thats call view transportation city center easy quick metro station outside hotel manage metro perfectly timed 30 minutes arch triomphe perfectly timed average found 60 minutes prepared stand wait porte doree station 20 minutes catch train am disappointed hotel hotel trip beyond honeymoon special expect prior leaving hotel upgrades free meals bottles wine celebrate sets bar level hotel isnt willing beyond special experience traveler hotel food near bakery street wonderful pastries restaurant corner called le cascades food wonderful service overall stay hotels closer city center cost little worth 60 minute metro ride chose book hotel please dont pay extra superior double lie waste money

Reviews.Title: “Conveniently located, great value for money”
Reviews.Author: PS79
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel five days july trip included european city time stayed experience ago pleasant location hotel excellent close metro lots access middle touristy expensive neighborhood quiet shops fond memories patisserie street remembered bring home croissants aux pain aux raisins theres corner macdonalds fast cheap lots little grocery shops light dinner tabac drugstore restaurants cafe les cascades cause late food expensive corner pizza shop hotel nice clean service computer internet access floor wireless access experience lobbyreception overall satisfied hotel cant wait visit paris hotel

Reviews.Title: “Booking online can be glitchy but the stay is worth it”
Reviews.Author: periwinkl
Reviews.Content: massively convoluted exchange caused temporary glitch online booking system meant nearly week amend update terms booking frustrating email answered staff idea history time hotel excellent breakfast absolute delight probably favourite meal paris particularly served charming indian gentleman book ahead offers value advantage triple 100 euros night including breakfast

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value boutique hotel”

Reviews.Content: charming hotel standard typical size paris little centre peripherique practically top metro station makes difference neighbourhood quiet sufficient shops cafes provide breakfast incidental requirements beautiful park close definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, recommend it to any traveller”

Reviews.Content: children stayed triple hotel size bathroom beds comfortable clean quiet night price value hotel situated location porte doree metro station access centre paris breeze bakery road grab quick cheap breakfast plenty dinner options street monoprix supermarket definitely recommended traveller

Reviews.Content: stayed spacious cozy triple feel comfortable hotel everyday display photos website staffs helpful breakfast excellent breakfast else location conveniently price bargain shower ll blind definitely stay paris

Reviews.Content: spent 5 nights conveniently located hotel literally steps metro elevator tiny taking stairs option requested 1st floor 1st night twin 5 street found little cramped 2 accommodating moving directly hall 9 roomier simply nicely furnished unique size close eat porte doree corner pricey wonderful look behaved dogs youve found authentic french bakery street wonderful closed sunday monday corner grocery blocks close metro hear train underneath building light sleepers maybe upper floors internet site offered hotel contacted directly day crew speaks excellent english night crew limited neighborhood coming walk night except invasion ants happy value offered

Reviews.Content: 2 hotel paris arrived checking lady desk american helped lot hotel 2030 min metro ride line rarely change meant benefits paris noise unless hundred bags shower powerful reviews mentioned temperature variance notice unexpected showers building bed comfortable tastefully decorated breakfast ours included bother paid separately 12 euros breakfast elsewhere mention ear plugs recommended hear vibrations metro underneath didnt awake partner light sleeper restaurants hotel necessarily cheaper centre paris dont hotel thinking cheaper definitely recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Romantic little hotel”

Reviews.Content: recommend hotel decorated personally taste spacious hotel appreciate carpets excellent beds white crispy duvets immediately feel home bus stop subway stop front house nice bakery street typical parisian street market takes sunday morning staff welcoming friendly definitely prefer cramped overpriced downtown hotels
